maqras.text: I do not swear/make oath with that, the country/land
And you are placed in/occupying (residing) at this , the country/land
And a father and what he gave birth (to)/procreated
We had created the human/mankind in hardship
Does he think/suppose that no one is capable/over powering on (over) him
He says: "I destroyed/wasted plenty property/possession/wealth
Does he think/suppose that (E) no one sees him
Did We not make/create for him two eyes
And a tongue , and two lips
And We guided him (to) the two paths/good or bad
So he did not rush/force (himself) into the high mountain path/road
And what made you know/informed you what the high mountain path/road (is)
Releasing/freeing a neck/person/slave
Or feeding in a day/time of hunger/starvation/famine
An orphan of a relation/near/close
Or a poorest of poor/poor oppressed of poverty
Then he was from those who believed and directed/commanded each other with the patience, and directed/commanded each other with the mercy/compassion
Those are the blessings`/right`s (side`s/hand`s) owners/friends/company
And those who disbelieved with Our verses/evidences , they are the bad omen`s/left side`s owners/friends/company
Stationary/residing fire (is) on them
And/by the sun and its sunrise/day light
And/by the moon when/if it followed it
And/by the daytime when/if it shined/revealed it
And/by the night when/if it covers/darkens it
And/by the sky/space and who built/constructed it
And/by the earth/Planet Earth and who spread and extended it
And/by a self and who straightened it
So He inspired/transmitted (to) it its debauchery/corruption, and its fear and obedience of God
Who purified/corrected it had succeeded/won
And who buried it/plotted against it (corrupted it) had failed/despaired
Thamud had lied/denied/falsified with its own tyranny/excess of the limit
When/if its most miserable/unhappy stirred up/urged
So God`s messenger said to them: "God`s female camel, and its drink/drinking (water)
So they denied him , so they wounded it/slaughtered it/made it infertile, so their Lord became angry/destroyed on them because of their crime, so He straightened it
And He does not fear its end/turn (result)
And/by the night when/if it covers/darkens
And/by the daytime when/if it uncovered/shined
And/by what (who) created the male and the female
That truly your striving/endeavor (is) separate/different (E)
So but who gave/granted and feared and obeyed
And gave charity/confirmed with the best/most beautiful
So We will ease him to the ease/prosperity
And but who was stingy/miser and sufficed/availed
And lied/denied/falsified with the best/most beautiful
So We will ease him to the difficulty/hardship
And his property/possession/wealth does not enrich/suffice (replace) from him if he fell/was destroyed
That truly on Us (is) the guidance (E)
And that truly for Us (is) the end (other life) (E), and the first/beginning
And so I warned you/gave you notice (of) a fire blazing/burning/inflaming
None roasts/suffers it except the most miserable/unhappy
Who lied/denied/falsified and turned away
And the most fearing and obeying will be made to avoid it/be distanced from it
Who gives/brings his property/possession/wealth (and) purifies/corrects (himself)
And (there) is not to anyone at Him from a blessing/goodness to be rewarded/reimbursed
Except wishing/desiring his Lord`s the highest`s/mightiest`s/most dignified`s face/front (path)
And he/He will/shall (E) accept/approve
And/by the sunrise/daybreak
And/by the night when/if it quietened/became covered
Your Lord did not leave/desert you , and nor hate/hit (you) on the head
And the end (other life) (E) (is) better for you than the first/beginning
And your Lord will/shall (E) give/grant you , so you accept/approve
Did He not find you an orphan , so he sheltered (you)
And He found you misguided so He guided (you)
And He found you having dependents/poor , so He enriched/satisfied (you)
So as for the orphan , so do not humiliate/compel
And as for the asker/questioner/beggar , so do not yell at/drive away
And as for with your Lord`s blessing/goodness , so tell/inform
